DOC.brief_summary: The primary goal of this retrospective study is to evaluate the male breast cancer patient population at Summa Health System/Akron City Hospital over a period of 18 years and compare the findings to historical data. The objectives are to: - identify risk factors. - evaluate stage and histology at the time of presentation. - document treatment modalities and outcomes. - analyze outcomes for comparison to historical data.
DOC.brief_title: Male Breast Cancer Summa Health System/Akron City Hospital Experience 1995-2007
DOC.criteria: Male breast cancer patients diagnosed and/or treated at Summa Health System/Akron City Hospital from the reference year of 1995 through 2007.
DOC.keyword: Male breast cancer patients diagnosed and/or
treated at Summa Health System/Akron City Hospital
from the reference year of 1995 through 2007.
